title: Smart Inventory Management System
description: Implement an intelligent inventory management system that automatically tracks stock levels, predicts demand patterns, and generates reorder alerts to optimize inventory costs and prevent stockouts.
iWant: an automated inventory system that tracks stock and predicts demand
soThat: I can maintain appropriate inventory levels and reduce costs while preventing stockouts
acceptanceCriteria: System automatically tracks real-time stock levels across all locations
Demand forecasting algorithm predicts future inventory needs based on historical data
Automated reorder alerts trigger when stock reaches predefined minimum thresholds
Dashboard displays inventory metrics including turnover rates and cost analysis
